channel.title: Anyone know whats happening with RiD?
channel.description: The sites been down all day. I know they were getting DDoSed yesterday and they came back, and RiD also mentioned that they were going to do a update for the site but this seems like a ridiculous time and I need to get on the site to download the latest bot so I can finish a text alert program I made in java in-case the bot crashes. Are they getting hit with another DDoS?

item.title: Anyone know whats happening with RiD?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

What a shame they don’t have dungeon oak door makers

EDIT

Actually, I’ll follow some tuts and try and make my own, then release it

Hm… it seems simple enough…
by the way, does RiD use simba too? Just curious
Nope runs with java just realized it

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know whats happening with RiD?

there’s a few scripts on these forums, however go on over to http://villavu.com/ to get more.

item.title: Anyone know whats happening with RiD?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:419666”]There are a few scripts released here, and a lot over at the SRL forums, or you can write your own of course.

And it’s not only free as in cost, but also free as in speech, all open source under a good license. :)[/quote]
Hm… interesting… I’ll look into this later, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know whats happening with RiD?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:7, topic:419666”]Very simply

it uses advanced colour clicking algorithms which making it pretty successful at botting, I used to use it a lot on my legit pures so they didn’t get banned. highest level i got was a 89 in ranged.

Then I just used iBot and got 99 str/magic/range/hp.[/quote]
O, so its kind of like RiD? But free?
Also, I’d think I have to create my own scripts right? Or are they released somewhere, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know whats happening with RiD?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Yeah… I tried going on their site (Using their free con bot atm) and its always down… and for some reason, I can connect to the bot on my desktop, but not on my laptop.

EDIT

Anyone know a construction script working at the moment? Or is RiD the only one right now?

Btw, if any of you want the bot download, I’m sure I can help

Read full topic
